title: US immigration policy has a huge blind spot: climate change
description: Storms, flooding, and drought displace millions of people, but the US still lacks legal protections for climate migrants.
content:
Joe Biden raised hopes that the US would finally plan for climate-displaced migrants. Today, its still a glaring hole in climate and immigration policy.
